html: (2 Nephi 7:9)."They shall wax old as a garment." To wax is to increase in intensity. Thus those who condemn or fight against the Lord, His work, or His servants, will become as an old garment, useless and cast aside. The Savior admonished all to seek after things "which wax not old." (Luke 12:33; see also DCE, 627.)
